result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Sauk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
With huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before Nov. 28, 2014.  May serve in LaCrosse Co.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Cover Letter from defendant
Restitution

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in court with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State notes restitution paid to their office today ($1,344.00).  Stipulation to be filed.  $134.45 is the restitution surcharge which will be rolled into the costs in this case.  State states recs.  Atty Lawton agrees.  VIS provided to parties and reviewed.  Court grants motion to amend to Misd. Theft and Atty Lawton pleads NC.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty and sentences.

Ct 1:  NC - to Misd. Theft
90 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 11/28/2014 at 6:30 pm
1 day sentence credit
May serve in LaCrosse Co if accepted
EMP approved
$443.00 and 10% surcharge on resitution to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
Restitution itself has been paid in full
Return date on September 30, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on September 5, 2014 at 10:00 am.
Return date on September 17, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in court with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Lawton notes he was just appointed.  Requests prelim.  Court notes waiver has already occured.  PTC and RD reset.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 5, 2014 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for September 17, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on August 22, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in court.  Attorney Klopp is not present today.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews file.  Warrant previously quashed.  Defendant request to release Attorney Klopp.  Court goes through process of asking for new public defender appointment.  Court resets matter for defendant to go to PD office to take care of matter.  State has no objection.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for August 22, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on August 7, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE explains nonappearance/says he left message w/Atty Klopp just before court today.  State requests cash bond.  Court cancels authorization for warrant and resets matter based on explanation by DE.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for August 7, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Roger L. Klopp in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Klopp states he hasn't heard from DE and doesn't know why they're not here.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant
Return date on July 31, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Roger L. Klopp in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Klopp gives status.  Defendant phoned this morning, did not have transportation today.  Request a stay of warrant.  State does not object.  Court allows.    Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant, stayed.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for July 31, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Arraignment on July 23, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Arraignment on July 11, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Kevin R Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Prelim. Hrg. waived, Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 2.  Set over for arraignment.  Bond continues.  Arraignment scheduled for July 11, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 27, 2014 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is not resolved.  Request PH.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 09:30 am.
No contact w/SF or Lake Delton Walmart

Pre-trial conference on May 2, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Return date on May 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch by video from LEC with attorney Debra V. O'Rourke.  Defendant Jonlazaire C. Burch in custody.  Sue M. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests cash bond.  Atty O'Rourke responds.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $1,000.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact w/S.F. or the Lake Delton Wal-Mart.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 2, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Return date scheduled for May 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
